name: Manage contacts in KlickTipp via Telegram AI Agent
description:
This integration template creates an intelligent Telegram bot powered by AI (Claude or OpenAI) that seamlessly connects with KlickTipp's contact management platform. Users can interact with their KlickTipp account using natural language commands directly through Telegram, making contact management and email automation accessible from any mobile device.

Perfect for marketing teams, agencies, and businesses who want to streamline their KlickTipp operations. Whether you're on the go, working with field teams, or simply prefer conversational interfaces, this integration brings the full power of KlickTipp to your fingertips through Telegram.
Setup is straightforward - connect your Telegram bot, configure the AI agent with your preferred LLM and your KlickTipp tools, and start managing contacts using simple, conversational commands.
